text: 9.23: Ro 8.28-30; Ef 1.3-12; Kor 1.27Ana khueŋ vuzvugi, kha gumgi, mbe zam ana vhava ŋaar gum ana ŋkasŋka bakɨme kaŋgirga. Ana mba gumgi gu mbigi, ana mpirmpirɨga vhuun mben nɨɨn za mbui, ana vhɨra mbe kora muuŋgi. Ana fhum guarara, ana mba gumgi gu mbigi ga muuŋgiap, ana mba mpirmpirɨgar vhuun mben nɨɨŋv, ana vhɨra zɨ bakɨmen mben nɨɨnga.
